name: Retroacan
description:
Retroacan

The whole city has been invaded by mysterious pixelated monsters, so it's up to Neek and his allies to save the day!

Retrocan is an action platformer with an old school aesthetic. Jump and shoot your way through the city of Culiacán while you save your friends and restore everything to normal.

Features

-Choose from 3 starter characters and unlock 3 more, each one with different speed, power and fire rate!

-Travel through levels inspired on our home city, Culiacán!

-Fight against 3 unique bosses!

-And more!
